DOC.brief_summary: Surgical outcome of entropion associated with Down's syndrome was evaluated. Grading scale of superficial punctate keratopathy and score of wearing glasses to correct refractive errors were measured.
DOC.brief_title: Eyelash Line Resection for Entropion Associated With Down's Syndrome
DOC.criteria: The patients with entropion with Down's syndrome The patients of Down's syndrome who do not have entropion.
